name: CGMessageTextView
summary: A UITextView subclass that adds support for changing dynamically the height in base of the text.
description: A UITextView subclass that adds support for changing dynamically the height in base of the text. Also it has multiline placeholder thanks to https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/KMPlaceholderTextView. All is written in Swift and it use AutoLayout.
